[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["2021 年 12 月 17 日 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/jtannady","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Jesslyn Tannady"}]," 与 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/rickhanlonii","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Rick Hanlon"}]]}],"
",["$r","hr",null,{}],"
",["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":["上周，我们举办了第六届 React Conf。在以往的几年中，我们在 React Conf 的舞台上发布了行业改变的信息，如 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://engineering.fb.com/2015/03/26/android/react-native-bringing-modern-web-techniques-to-mobile/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"React Native"}]}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://reactjs.org/docs/hooks-intro.html","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"React Hooks"}]}],"。今年，我们从发布 React 18 和逐步采用并发功能开始，分享了我们对 React 的多平台愿景。"]}]}],"
",["$r","hr",null,{}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"这是 React Conf 首次在线举办，并且免费直播，并翻译成 8 种不同的语言。来自世界各地的参与者参加了我们的会议 Discord 和针对所有时区都可访问的重播活动。超过 50000 人注册，19 场演讲总共有超过 60000 次观看，Discord 平台上两个活动共有 5000 名参与者。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["所有的演讲都可以 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FZ0cG47msEk&list=PLNG_1j3cPCaZZ7etkzWA7JfdmKWT0pMsa","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"在线播放"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"以下是大会分享内容的摘要："}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"react-18-and-concurrent-features","children":"React 18 和并发特性 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在主题演讲中，我们分享了从 React 18 开始对未来 React 的愿景。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在没有引入任何重大的破坏性变化的情况下，React 18 添加了期待已久的并发渲染器和对 Suspense 的更新。应用程序可以升级到 React 18 并开始逐步采用并发功能，其工作量与任何其他主要版本相当。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"这意味着没有并发模式，只有并发功能"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在主题演讲中，我们还分享了对 Suspense、服务器组件、新 React 工作组的愿景，以及对 React Native 的长期多平台愿景。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["请在此处观看 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/acdlite","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Andrew Clark"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/_jstejada","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Juan Tejada"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/potetotes","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Lauren Tan"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/rickhanlonii","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Rick Hanlon"}]," 的完整主题演讲："]}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/FZ0cG47msEk"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"react-18-for-application-developers","children":"面向应用程序开发人员的 React 18 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在主题演讲中，我们还宣布 React 18 RC 现已可供试用。在等待进一步的反馈之前，这是我们将于明年初发布稳定版的 React 版本。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"要尝试 React 18 RC，请升级你的依赖项："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"npm install react@rc react-dom@rc
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["并切换到新的 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"createRoot"}]," API："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-js","children":"// 切换前
const container = document.getElementById('root');
ReactDOM.render(<App />, container);

// 切换后
const container = document.getElementById('root');
const root = ReactDOM.createRoot(container);
root.render(<App/>);
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["有关升级到 React 18 的演示，请参阅 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/shrutikapoor08","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Shruti Kapoor"}]," 的演讲："]}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ytudH8je5ko"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"streaming-server-rendering-with-suspense","children":"Suspense 串流服务端渲染 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"React 18 还包括使用 Suspense 对服务端渲染性能的改进。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["串流服务端渲染允许你从服务器上的 React 组件生成 HTML，并将该 HTML 流式传输给用户。在 React 18 中，你可以使用 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Suspense"}]," 将应用程序分解为更小的独立单元，这些单元可以彼此独立地进行流式传输，而不会阻塞应用程序的其余部分。这意味着用户将更快地看到你的内容，并能够更快地开始与之交互。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["如需深入了解，请参阅 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/shaundai","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Shaundai Person"}]," 的演讲："]}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/pj5N-Khihgc"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"the-first-react-working-group","children":"第一个 React 工作组 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["对于 React 18，我们创建了第一个工作组，与专家、开发人员、库维护人员和教育工作者小组合作。我们共同制定了逐步采用策略并完善了新的 API，例如 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"useId"}],"、",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"useSyncExternalStore"}]," 和 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"useInsertionEffect"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["有关这项工作的概述，请参阅 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/aakansha1216","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Aakansha’ Doshi"}]," 的演讲："]}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/qn7gRClrC9U"}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":"为了支持此版本中的新功能，我们还宣布了新成立的 React DevTools 团队和新的 Timeline Profiler，以帮助开发人员调试他们的 React 应用程序。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["有关新 DevTools 功能的更多信息和演示，请参阅 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/brian_d_vaughn","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Brian Vaughn"}]," 的演讲："]}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":["感谢我们的会议主席 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/jtannady","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Jesslyn Tannady"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/missuze","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Suzie Grange"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/beccaliz","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Becca Bailey"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/lunaleaps","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Luna Wei"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/jsjoeio","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Joe Previte"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/Cortinico","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Nicola Corti"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/gweterings","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Gijs Weterings"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/claudiopro","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Claudio Procida"}],"、Julia Neumann、Mengdi Chen、Jean Zhang、Ricky Li 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/Huxpro","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Xuan Huang (黄玄)"}],"。"]}],"
